message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $14500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.
